item.title: Data Science for Fraud Detection
item.description: I have written the following post about Data Science for Fraud Detection at my company codecentric’s blog: Fraud can be defined as “the crime of getting money by deceiving people” (Cambridge Dictionary); it is as old as humanity: whenever two parties exchange goods or conduct business there is the potential for one party scamming the other. With an ever increasing use of the internet for shopping, banking, filing insurance claims, etc.

item.title: Hidden pagination showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the pagination is hidden.
